title: Future Apple Watch production could come from a different supplier
content:
One of Apple’s biggest suppliers is ramping up production to fund six new projects – one of which being wearable devices. It seems Luxshare Precision Industry Company, based in China, may soon be diving into Apple Watch production.

more…

The post Future Apple Watch production could come from a different supplier appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: One of Apple’s biggest suppliers, the current manufacturer of AirPods, Luxshare, may soon be diving into Apple Watch production.
